thread.title: IMF poised to cut growth forecasts as emerging markets face triple threat
thread.title_full: IMF poised to cut growth forecasts as emerging markets face triple threat

author: Szu Ping Chan
title: IMF poised to cut growth forecasts as emerging markets face triple threat
text: Economics IMF poised to cut growth forecasts as emerging markets face triple threat Christine Lagarde says emerging market economies face being caught on the "wrong side" of slower growth in China, weaker commodity prices and the prospect of higher US interest rates China's transition to a more market-based economy is complex and could well be somewhat bumpy, according to IMF chief Christine Lagarde Photo: AP
